The "Smart Vac" - a vacuum cleaner that uses artificial intelligence to optimize cleaning routes and adjust suction power based on the type of surface being cleaned. It can also detect and avoid obstacles, making it more efficient and safe to use.

The "Vac-a-Matic" - a vacuum cleaner that uses a unique air-tight seal to capture 99.97% of dust, dirt, and allergens, while also being easy to maneuver and lightweight. It also comes with a built-in HEPA filter for added cleaning power.

The "CleanBreeze" - a vacuum cleaner that uses a specialized fan to create a powerful air current, making it easier to clean hard-to-reach areas and tight spaces. It also has a detachable handheld vacuum for quick cleanups and spot cleaning.

The "EcoClean" - a vacuum cleaner that runs on a rechargeable battery and comes with a built-in solar panel for easy charging. It also has a low noise mode for late-night cleaning and a specialized filter that captures 99.9% of particles as small as 0.3 microns.

The "Vac-a-Mirror" - a vacuum cleaner that uses a unique mirrored surface to reflect light and create a more efficient cleaning experience. It also comes with a built-in HEPA filter and a detachable handheld vacuum for quick cleanups and spot cleaning.
